General.Name: Airtrona Intl Inc
General.Description: AirTrona International Inc. provides various commercial and industrial Ozone generators for a range of commercial, industrial, and residential applications. Its products include ozone sanitization and ozone laundry systems. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Stoney Creek, Canada.
General.Address: 1040 South Service Road, Stoney Creek, ON, Canada, L8E 6G3

1.Name: Mr. Juan Restrepo Gutierrez
1.Title: CFO, COO, Principal Accounting Officer, Sec. and Director
